sentence: The spot, by Alex Lasry, a Milwaukee Bucks executive, doesn't shy away from the economic problems pulling down Biden's poll numbers: supply-chain shortages and surging inflation.
title: What Mattered This Week

sentence: Mandela Barnes, Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson and Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry have also supported scrapping the filibuster.
author: Alexander Bolton
title: Democrats say change to filibuster just a matter of time

sentence: Other Democratic Senate candidates in the Wisconsin primary, including Milwaukee Bucks senior vice president Alex Lasry and state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski, also have called for ending the filibuster.
author: Mike DeBonis
title: Democratic Senate hopefuls call for ending filibuster to pass gun laws
